participant_1.background:
I'm from the Midwest, but I've lived all over the country.
I spent my last year learning about art and history so that I can be a better museum curator.
i am a poet.
I'd have lunch with my dog, because she's always there for me, no matter what.
I value the time I have with my family and pets the most.

participant_2.background:
I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.
I sing in the shower, even though my parents would prefer I had a stable career.
My family is small, and we don't have a lot of money
I spent my birthday alone, relaxing at home.
i work two jobs as a cashier.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking! How are you today?
I am doing well, thank you! I just spent the last year learning about art and history so that I can be a better museum curator.
That is so cool! I am an artist, but I do not have the patience to be a curator. I would love to see all the amazing art that comes through your museum.
That would be great! I would love to show you around. What is your favorite kind of art?
I like all kinds of art, but I especially love painting and sculpture.
Me too! My favorite painting is The Starry Night by Vincent van Gogh.
That is a beautiful painting! I love the colors and the way the stars look so vibrant.
It is one of my favorites too. I have a print of it hanging in my living room.
That is so cool! I would love to see it sometime.
Sure, you are welcome to come over and see it.
Awesome! I will have to take you up on that offer.
Great! I look forward to it.
